```{r,echo=F}
ab = sample(2:9,2)
a = ab[1]*0.1
b = ab[2]

```




Question
========

Evaluate the product.

$$`r a` \cdot `r b`$$



Solution
========

First, recognize that $`r a`=`r a*10`\cdot 0.1$.

You can rewrite the product...
$$(`r a*10` \cdot `r b`) \cdot (0.1)$$

$$`r a*b*10`  \cdot 0.1$$

Multiplying by 0.1 moves the decimal point 1 digit to the left.


$$`r a*b`$$


Meta-information
============
extype: num
exsolution: `r a*b`
exname: mult_tenth_unit
